page.title: 05HOLT LIBRARY.
page.content: HOLT LIBRARY HAS{14262 BOOKS.}THEY DO NOT HAVE A COPY OF THE OLD DOMESDAY BOOK.THE MAIN PART OF THE LIBRARY IS 130 YEARS OLD. THE OTHER PART IS ONLY 30 YEARS OLD. THEY HAVE ALL SORTS OF BOOKS. THERE ARE{5 STAFF.}THE LIBRARY OPENS AT 10 AM TO 1 PM AND CLOSES AT 2 PM AND 5 PM ON 3 DAYS A WEEK. 4000 PEOPLE COME FROM HOLT AND DISTRICT. THERE IS A MOBILE LIBRARY. THE PEOPLE WHO COME TO THE LIBRARY ARE ALL AGES. THE MOST POPULAR BOOKS ARE STORY BOOKS. THE POPULATION OF HOLT IS{3000 PEOPLE.}THE FAVOURITE AUTHORS ARE{CATHERINE COOKSON}AND {VICTORIA HOLT.}THEY HAVE GOT A BOOK ON THE HISTORY OF HOLT. THE PRESENT LIBRARY WAS STABLING FOR WANSBECK HOUSE THE PREMISES OF WHICH EXTENDED UP TO THE CHURCHYARD WALL. AT WANSBECK HOUSE LIVED JOHN BANKS, A SURGEON IN THE FIRST HALF OF THE LAST CENTURY.
